English.title: Lymphedema Early Detection System
English.about_text: This is the Lymphedema Early Detection System. It is designed to detect early signs of lymphedema using machine learning algorithms.
English.Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Low r: Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Low risk.
Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Mild.
English.Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Moder: Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Moderate/Severe.
English.您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 低风险。: Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Low risk.
English.您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 轻度。: Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Mild.
English.您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 中度/重度。: Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Moderate/Severe.
English.Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Bajo: Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Low risk.
English.Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Leve: Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Mild.
English.Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Mode: Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Moderate/Severe.
English.Time lapse since your recent breast canc: Time lapse since your recent breast cancer surgery (years)
English.How much do you feel your shoulder movem: How much do you feel your shoulder movement is limited?
English.How much do you feel your elbow movement: How much do you feel your elbow movement is limited?
English.How much do you feel your wrist movement: How much do you feel your wrist movement is limited?
English.How much do you feel your fingers moveme: How much do you feel your fingers movement is limited?
English.How much do you feel your arm movement i: How much do you feel your arm movement is limited?
English.How much do your arm or hand swell: if b: How much do your arm or hand swell: if both, select the most intense feelings.
English.How much does your breast swell?: How much does your breast swell?
English.How much does your chest swell?: How much does your chest swell?
English.Do you feel pain, aching, or soreness: i: Do you feel pain, aching, or soreness: if more than one feeling, select the most intense one.
English.The feeling of burning of your affected: The feeling of burning of your affected arm.
English.The feeling of stabbing of your affected: The feeling of stabbing of your affected arm.
English.The feeling of tingling, or feeling of n: The feeling of tingling, or feeling of needles of your affected arm.
English.The feeling of fatigue of your affected: The feeling of fatigue of your affected arm.
English.The feeling of weakness of your affected: The feeling of weakness of your affected arm.
English.How much does your affected arm looks re: How much does your affected arm looks red?
English.How much does your affected arm feel hot: How much does your affected arm feel hot?
English.How much does your affected arm feel sti: How much does your affected arm feel stiff?
English.How much does your affected arm feel sen: How much does your affected arm feel sensitive or tender when touching things?
English.The number of removed sentinel lymph nod: The number of removed sentinel lymph nodes.
English.The number of removed axillary lymph nod: The number of removed axillary lymph nodes
English.The number of removed lymph nodes when t: The number of removed lymph nodes when the patient has both SLNB and ALND removed.
English.Whether the patient had hormonal therapy: Whether the patient had hormonal therapy.
English.In the detection page, detailed instruct: In the detection page, detailed instructions are shown when you move the cursor🖱️ close to the words (for example, Your age (years)...).

Chinese.title: 淋巴水肿早期检测系统
Chinese.about_text: 这是淋巴水肿早期检测系统。它旨在使用机器学习算法检测淋巴水肿的早期迹象。
Chinese.your_predicted_lymphedema_risk: 您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: {risk}。
Chinese.Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Low r: 您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 低风险。
您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 轻度。
Chinese.Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Moder: 您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 中度/重度。
Chinese.您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 低风险。: 您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 低风险。
Chinese.您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 轻度。: 您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 轻度。
Chinese.您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 中度/重度。: 您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 中度/重度。
Chinese.Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Bajo: 您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 低风险。
Chinese.Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Leve: 您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 轻度。
Chinese.Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Mode: 您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 中度/重度。
Chinese.SLNB_Removed_LN: 前哨淋巴结活检移除数量
Chinese.ALND_Removed_LN: 腋窝淋巴结清扫移除数量
Chinese.SLNB_ALND_Removed: 前哨和腋窝淋巴结清扫移除数量
Chinese.Time lapse since your recent breast canc: 最近一次乳腺癌手术后的时间间隔（年）
Chinese.How much do you feel your shoulder movem: 你觉得你的肩膀活动受限程度如何？
Chinese.How much do you feel your elbow movement: 你觉得你的肘部活动受限程度如何？
Chinese.How much do you feel your wrist movement: 你觉得你的手腕活动受限程度如何？
Chinese.How much do you feel your fingers moveme: 你觉得你的手指活动受限程度如何？
Chinese.How much do you feel your arm movement i: 你觉得你的手臂活动受限程度如何？
Chinese.How much do your arm or hand swell: if b: 你的手臂或手部肿胀程度如何：如果两者都有肿胀，请选择最严重的感觉。
Chinese.How much does your breast swell?: 你的乳房肿胀程度如何？
Chinese.How much does your chest swell?: 你的胸部肿胀程度如何？
Chinese.Do you feel pain, aching, or soreness: i: 你是否感到疼痛、酸痛或痛感：如果有多种感觉，请选择最强烈的一种。
Chinese.The feeling of tingling, or feeling of n: 受影响手臂的刺痛感或针刺感。
Chinese.How much does your affected arm looks re: 受影响的手臂看起来有多红？
Chinese.How much does your affected arm feel hot: 受影响的手臂感觉有多热？
Chinese.How much does your affected arm feel sti: 受影响的手臂感觉有多僵硬？
Chinese.How much does your affected arm feel sen: 受影响的手臂在触摸物体时感觉有多敏感或柔嫩？
Chinese.Does you affected arm blisters?: 受影响的手臂是否起水泡？
Chinese.The number of removed sentinel lymph nod: 切除的前哨淋巴结数量。
Chinese.The number of removed axillary lymph nod: 切除的腋窝淋巴结数量
Chinese.The number of removed lymph nodes when t: 患者切除前哨淋巴结和腋窝淋巴结的数量。
患者是否接受了乳房切除术。
患者是否接受了肿块切除术。
Chinese.Whether the patient had hormonal therapy: 患者是否接受了激素治疗。
Chinese.In the detection page, detailed instruct: 在检测页面中，当您将光标🖱️移到靠近单词的地方(例如，年龄(年)…)时，将显示详细的说明。

Spanish.title: Sistema de Detección Temprana de Linfedema
Spanish.about_text: Este es el Sistema de Detección Temprana de Linfedema. Está diseñado para detectar signos tempranos de linfedema utilizando algoritmos de aprendizaje automático.
Spanish.your_predicted_lymphedema_risk: Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: {risk}.
Spanish.Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Low r: Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Bajo riesgo.
Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Leve.
Spanish.Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Moder: Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Moderado/Severo.
Spanish.您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 低风险。: Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Bajo riesgo.
Spanish.您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 轻度。: Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Leve.
Spanish.您预测的淋巴水肿风险是: 中度/重度。: Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Moderado/Severo.
Spanish.Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Bajo: Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Bajo riesgo.
Spanish.Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Leve: Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Leve.
Spanish.Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Mode: Su riesgo de linfedema predicho es: Moderado/Severo.
Spanish.Toughness or thickness of skin: Dureza o grosor de la piel
Spanish.Time lapse since your recent breast canc: Tiempo transcurrido desde su reciente cirugía de cáncer de mama (años)
Spanish.How much do you feel your shoulder movem: ¿Cuánto siente que su movimiento del hombro está limitado?
Spanish.How much do you feel your elbow movement: ¿Cuánto siente que su movimiento del codo está limitado?
Spanish.How much do you feel your wrist movement: ¿Cuánto siente que su movimiento de la muñeca está limitado?
Spanish.How much do you feel your fingers moveme: ¿Cuánto siente que su movimiento de los dedos está limitado?
Spanish.How much do you feel your arm movement i: ¿Cuánto siente que su movimiento del brazo está limitado?
Spanish.How much do your arm or hand swell: if b: ¿Cuánto se hinchan su brazo o mano: si ambos, seleccione las sensaciones más intensas?
Spanish.Do you feel pain, aching, or soreness: i: ¿Siente dolor, molestia o sensibilidad: si siente más de una sensación, seleccione la más intensa?
Spanish.The feeling of burning of your affected: La sensación de ardor en su brazo afectado.
Spanish.The feeling of stabbing of your affected: La sensación de puñalada en su brazo afectado.
Spanish.The feeling of tingling, or feeling of n: La sensación de hormigueo o sensación de agujas en su brazo afectado.
Spanish.The feeling of fatigue of your affected: La sensación de fatiga en su brazo afectado.
Spanish.The feeling of weakness of your affected: La sensación de debilidad en su brazo afectado.
Spanish.How much does your affected arm looks re: ¿Qué tan roja se ve su brazo afectado?
Spanish.How much does your affected arm feel hot: ¿Qué tan caliente se siente su brazo afectado?
Spanish.How much does your affected arm feel sti: ¿Qué tan rígido se siente su brazo afectado?
Spanish.How much does your affected arm feel sen: ¿Qué tan sensible o tierno se siente su brazo afectado al tocar cosas?
Spanish.The number of removed sentinel lymph nod: El número de ganglios linfáticos centinela eliminados.
Spanish.The number of removed axillary lymph nod: El número de ganglios linfáticos axilares eliminados
Spanish.The number of removed lymph nodes when t: El número de ganglios linfáticos eliminados cuando el paciente tiene tanto SLNB como ALND eliminados.
Spanish.Whether the patient had hormonal therapy: Si el paciente tuvo terapia hormonal.
Spanish.In the detection page, detailed instruct: En la página de detección, se muestran instrucciones detalladas cuando mueve el cursor🖱️ cerca de las palabras (por ejemplo, su edad (años)...).
